summary: You can ride a Giant (2x Larger than normal giant) which is summonable.
descriptionHtml:
Description
______________________________
Look in your inventory for a book called "Spell Tome: Conjure Giants". Learn the spell and have fun conjuring Giants which you may ride on. To walk at a normal speed while controling the giant, hold the shift key. :D To attack as a giant, click left mouse buttons a few times. :D

Installation
__________________________________________
Nexus Mod Mananger
1) Click download with NMM.

Manual Installation
1) Download the file.
2) Extract the file
3) Copy/Move the file to your Skyrim/Data directory

Visit this website for game reviews
_________________________________
http://blackrapgames.host-ed.me/

Bugs:
1) DON'T MOVE THE GIANT too far from your CHARACTER as the game will not render and the giant will go invisible and disapear. YOU WILL GET STUCK if that happens.
author: XGhostSlayer
